alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Potter; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 9:29PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central South Dakota. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Blowing snow Wednesday afternoon through Thursday could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Campbell; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Potter; Walworth
